reasoning: New frontend page to display team members directory using existing data structures and API endpoints. Multiple files will be touched but scope is contained to single service with established patterns.

scope.notes: Frontend-only feature. New directory page component, possibly new member card component, route configuration, and potentially API service modifications. Backend API endpoint `/team-members` already exists.

integrations.notes: No external integrations. Backend team member API already exists. Material UI components already in use for cards.

infrastructure.notes: Purely UI feature. No infrastructure changes required. Team member data model already exists in backend.

knowledge.notes: Existing TeamCard component shows similar pattern. TeamMember interface already defined. Material UI card patterns well-established in codebase. API fetching patterns exist.

concerns: Design reference (19-team-members.png) needs to be located and analyzed
Need to verify if new MemberCard component is needed or TeamCard can be reused
Requirements phase was minimal - context phase will need to fill gaps
risk.notes: Low risk as this builds on existing patterns and data structures. Main gap is design details from reference image.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: New UI page with data fetching requires unit tests for components and integration tests for API calls. No auth changes or sensitive data handling, so security scan not needed.
